Text: I'm experiencing some sort of glitch in the Hanoi Tower puzzle where once I put the smallest ring anywhere the rest of the rings collapse and I cant pick them up. Anyone else getting this?
Im experiencing the ring tower problem too. Also, I cant find the garden on the castle grounds?
Has anyone fixed the ring puzzle glitch?
i also had a problem with the hanoi tower thing.i do hope someone has found a solution for this?really wanna move on with the game.
had the same glitch. looked around for a solution but there's nothing and you can't move on til you do that puzzle. i just gave up.

hey if you guys need to get past the puzzle you will need a new save for soem reason its glitched hard it it will not be fixed here is a web site dedicated to save past certain points.
http://www.savegameserver.com/
Just look up nancy drew and you will find it :]
